text: Eghtɨ an pam an akar dɨkɨrɨzim baregh, aruer kamra o an gɨn otivamin aruer igharazibar bizitamɨn a mɨkɨman koghtɨ, a damuasa mɨkemezir bizim, a guizbangɨra a damigh. An pam an akar dɨkɨrɨzim baregh dughiar kamra bizitamɨn a mɨkɨman koghtɨ, mati pam gavgavim amizimɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzim ganɨdi. Eghtɨ an amuim guizbangɨra akar dɨkɨrɨzir kam damigh.
